abstract: Kirstie Alley may star in "The Fabulous Lies of Hollywood Whores," a new comedy aimed at Broadway
snippet: Kirstie Alley may star in "The Fabulous Lies of Hollywood Whores," a new comedy aimed at Broadway
lead_paragraph: The musician Lance Bass is aiming a new play, "The Fabulous Lies of Hollywood Whores," for Broadway in spring 2012, with the television celebrity Kirstie Alley in negotiations to play a demanding diva who uses a Los Angeles department store as cover for her high-end escort service, an executive involved with the production said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Kirstie Alley May Lead 'Hollywood Whores' to Broadway
